column5: The Detroit River Walleye fishing has been crazy lately but I planned a trip to Florida a month ago so I had to take a break from the walleye fishing. Below is a video of the Blacktip I caught. If anyone ever has the chance to fish for these things I highly recommend it. Their power is incredible!
I spent many a night shark fishing in the Chesapeake Virginia in the 80's. Loads of fun and a great eating fish as well with the correct preparation.   Art
Sweet!   I'm headed to NC in two weeks and plan on doing some shore fishing in the inlets at night.
I have had shark steaks, I believe they were Mako, very good!
Ive never eaten shark. Id like to try it once.  Ive never caught a shark. Id like to do that everyday?
Looks like a lot of fun. Need to try that some day.
